author: Jill Lawless
title: U.K. clamps down to fight COVID-19, but confusion still reigns
description: Confusion rippled through Britain on Tuesday, a day after Prime Minister Boris Johnson ordered a three-week halt to all non-essential activity to fight the spread of the new coronavirus.
content:
Confusion rippled through Britain on Tuesday, a day after Prime Minister Boris Johnson ordered a three-week halt to all non-essential activity to fight the spread of the new coronavirus. 
Streets were empty but some subways were full. Hairdressers were close… [+5532 chars]
